resources.string: Specify repository address without protocol prefix in simple form: domain followed by path (e.g. github.com/reconquest/secrets).
Copy generated SSH public key and paste it in the repository\'s hosting platform settings (e.g. add it as read-only deploy key).

Each token will be matched against specified regexp to extract resource (e.g. site domain) and login to display them in the secrets list. Two named groups are used for this purpose: (?P<resource>) and (?P<login>). If no match can be found, then full token name will be used.
Master password will be securely stored on the device in encrypted form which is accessible only by using your fingerprint data.
